name: Tic Tac Toe (itch) (swilliamsio)
description:
This is Tic Tac Toe, also known as Noughts and Crosses. Play local multiplayer or against a (very dumb) computer. No frills. No thrills.

This is a bit of a personal experiment for me to make and upload something onto itch using the JavaScript React framework. I'm pleased that everything works, but hopefully this is just the first, and simplest, of many such games yet to come.

This game was made as part of the December 2021 One Game a Month Game Jam. The code for this game can be found on GitHub.
